items.sentence: Who do you expect to receive Christmas presents from?
Tom is planning to go to Boston next week, isn\'t he?
She fell in love with him the first time she met him.
She has spent hours at the gym trying to lose weight.
I\'m the one who suggested that Tom go out with Mary.
I don\'t want to hear about all your old girlfriends.
Tom didn\'t even text Mary to tell her he\'d be late.
Tom, weren\'t you supposed to invite only one friend?
Tom goes to school by bus, but he usually walks home.
Tom got down on one knee and asked Mary to marry him.
Tom got in trouble a lot at school when he was young.
I wish that you hadn\'t told that story to my mother.
I wonder how much it\'ll cost to build a new airport.
Tom rode his bicycle down a quiet residential street.
I suspect that Tom and Mary have finished doing that.
I talked to Tom this morning just before the meeting.
I think I should probably go home and get some sleep.
There were some burned-out structures along the road.
If it were not for water and salt, we could not live.
Do you think you could persuade Tom to join our team?
